Pricing.section_title: Unlock the Full Potential of the SaaS Template
Pricing.section_description: A free and open-source landing page template for your SaaS business, built with Next.js, TypeScript, Shadcn UI, and Tailwind CSS.

FAQ.answer-1: Yes, ChatPDF can read PDFs and answer questions in any language. You can upload a PDF in one language and ask questions in another. The greeting message will be in the PDF’s language. After that, ChatPDF will answer in the language you ask. If a message isn’t in the language you want, just ask ChatPDF to change it.
FAQ.answer-2: ChatPDF allows you to use it for free with 2 PDFs every day, each up to 120 pages. For more, you can upgrade to ChatPDF Plus.
FAQ.question-3: Can I chat with multiple PDF files at the same time?
FAQ.answer-3: You can! Create a folder and drag multiple PDFs into it. Then, click on the folder to chat with all PDFs at once. Creating a folder only works on a desktop computer, not from a phone.
FAQ.answer-4: ChatPDF will never share your files with anyone. They are stored on a secure cloud storage and can be deleted at any time.
FAQ.question-5: How do I delete a PDF from ChatPDF?
FAQ.answer-5: From Chat view: click gray Delete Chat button on the top right. From the Home page: click the X next to the chat title in the My Chats section. This will permanently delete the chat and PDF file content from ChatPDF servers.
FAQ.answer-6: In the analyzing step, ChatPDF creates a semantic index over all paragraphs of the PDF. When answering a question, ChatPDF finds the most relevant paragraphs from the PDF and uses the ChatGPT API from OpenAI to generate an answer.
